game.name: Worms Reloaded: Retro Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Downloadable Content, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The Worms™ Reloaded "Retro Pack" features 15 single-player missions that have been hand-picked from the classic Worms™: Armageddon game and re-worked exclusively for this downloadable content pack. The "Retro Pack" also includes 3 new hats, 3 new gravestones, a new landscape theme and 10 new Achieve
